'''2.10.22''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on September 21, 2023.

== Additions ==
* Added Lo-Fi Minecraft Melodies.

== Changes ==
* Improvements to how Launcher handles game update availabilities.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-23699}} - Minecraft launcher cannot load after being closed.
* {{bug|MCL-23679}} - Long installation names causes the quick play summary for it to become extremely long.
* {{bug|MCL-23680}} - Quick Play does not use custom scroll bar.
* {{bug|MCL-23709}} - Quick Play icon tooltips appear below other launcher content.
* {{bug|MCL-23727}} - New option "Skip java runtime version check" not working.</onlyinclude>
